---
title: "Topics in Econometrics"
subtitle: "MSc Advanced Economics 2024-2025 - ENS Lyon"
---


This website gathers all the materials and information for the course Topics in Econometrics (ECO5106) of the MSc Advanced Economics (2024-2025) at the ENS Lyon.


::: {.cell layout-align="center"}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](images/spiral.jpg){fig-align='center' width=80%}
:::
:::


::: callout-caution
This course will make an extensive use of R and RStudio. Please install it before class. You can find instructions for installation [here](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/intro#prerequisites).

You are also expected to have a previous knowledge of R and of the Tidyverse. If you do not, the book [**R for Data Science**](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/) is definitely the **best** resource to learn R and the [tidyverse](https://www.tidyverse.org/). Read it cover to cover, running all the code in the book yourself; by the time you finish the book, you will know R!
:::
